title: 新约 - 哥林多前书(1 Corinthians) - 第 5 章
subTitle: 新约 -- 哥林多前书(1 Corinthians) -- 第 5 章 ( 本篇共有 16 章 )

lineList.en: It is reported commonly that there is fornication among you, and such fornication as is not so much as named among the Gentiles, that one should have his father's wife.
lineList.cn: 风闻在你们中间有淫乱的事。这样的淫乱，连外邦人中也没有，就是有人收了他的继母。

lineList.en: And ye are puffed up, and have not rather mourned, that he that hath done this deed might be taken away from among you.
lineList.cn: 你们还是自高自大，并不哀痛，把行这事的人从你们中间赶出去。

lineList.en: For I verily, as absent in body, but present in spirit, have judged already, as though I were present, concerning him that hath so done this deed,
lineList.cn: 我身子虽不在你们那里，心却在你们那里，好像我亲自与你们同在，已经判断了行这事的人，

lineList.en: In the name of our Lord Jesus Christ, when ye are gathered together, and my spirit, with the power of our Lord Jesus Christ,
lineList.cn: 就是你们聚会的时候，我的心也同在，奉我们主耶稣的名，并用我们主耶稣的权能，

lineList.en: To deliver such an one unto Satan for the destruction of the flesh, that the spirit may be saved in the day of the Lord Jesus.
lineList.cn: 要把这样的人交给撒但，败坏他的肉体，使他的灵魂在主耶稣的日子可以得救。

lineList.en: Your glorying is not good. Know ye not that a little leaven leaveneth the whole lump?
lineList.cn: 你们这自夸是不好的。岂不知一点面酵能使全团发起来吗。

lineList.en: Purge out therefore the old leaven, that ye may be a new lump, as ye are unleavened. For even Christ our passover is sacrificed for us:
lineList.cn: 你们既是无酵的面，应当把旧酵除净，好使你们成为新团。因为我们逾越节的羔羊基督已经被杀献祭了。

lineList.en: Therefore let us keep the feast, not with old leaven, neither with the leaven of malice and wickedness; but with the unleavened bread of sincerity and truth.
lineList.cn: 所以，我们守这节不可用旧酵，也不可用恶毒（或作阴毒），邪恶的酵，只用诚实真正的无酵饼。

lineList.en: I wrote unto you in an epistle not to company with fornicators:
lineList.cn: 我先前写信给你们说，不可与淫乱的人相交。

lineList.en: Yet not altogether with the fornicators of this world, or with the covetous, or extortioners, or with idolaters; for then must ye needs go out of the world.
lineList.cn: 此话不是指这世上一概行淫乱的，或贪婪的，勒索的，或拜偶像的，若是这样，你们除非离开世界方可。

lineList.en: But now I have written unto you not to keep company, if any man that is called a brother be a fornicator, or covetous, or an idolater, or a railer, or a drunkard, or an extortioner; with such an one no not to eat.
lineList.cn: 但如今我写信给你们说，若有称弟兄，是行淫乱的，或贪婪的，或拜偶像的，或辱骂的，或醉酒的，或勒索的。这样的人不可与他相交。就是与他吃饭都不可。

lineList.en: For what have I to do to judge them also that are without? do not ye judge them that are within?
lineList.cn: 因为审判教外的人与我何干。教内的人岂不是你们审判的吗。

lineList.en: But them that are without God judgeth. Therefore put away from among yourselves that wicked person.
lineList.cn: 至于外人有神审判他们。你们应当把那恶人从你们中间赶出去。
